sentences.sContent: the unaccountable shyness she always felt in Louise’s presence
sentences.sCn: 她在路易丝面前总是感到的莫名羞涩

sentences.sContent: For some unaccountable reason, he arrived a day early.
sentences.sCn: 不知何故，他早到了一天。

synos.tran: 无责任的；莫名其妙的；不可理解的

remMethod.val: un (无) + accountable (a. 可解释的) → 无法解释的

trans.tranOther: very surprising and difficult to explain
